subject: Re: [junit] Test Locator
msgSnippet: ... The JUnit Best Practices article includes the source code for a test case finder, though it searches directories rather than the classpath:
messageBody:
"DiFrango, Ron" wrote:

> Guys,
>
> I know that I have seen something about this, but I could not find it
> anywhere. What I am looking for is code that will search the classpath for
> all the available tests. If it could also execute the tests that would be
> great.
>
> I do know that this is available as an ANT task, but it is not possible at
> this time to add that into our ANT build process.
>

The "JUnit Best Practices" article includes the source code for a test case
finder, though it searches directories rather than the classpath:

http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-12-2000/jw-1221-junit_p.html
